item.title: Tent and litter blocking seating area, 11th November
item.description:
Another tent is now in this area. One has been here for months despite reports. Historically this has been a massive issue here and has brought ASB, drug use etc to the area. The seating area that people use is now totally unusable.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Belgrave Road, Victoria, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street cleaning required on blackfen road, 11th November
item.description:
Its been reported that by the shops on blackfen road there is lots of leaves and litter, where its wet the leaves are becoming slippery and a man just witnesses an elderly couple nearly fall over. Online it shows that shop front are suppose to be cleared daily and he said this isnt happening. Someone has also left a couple of bags of rubbish here too. Please can someone look into this.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Blackfen Road, Blackfen, London
Report on FixMyStreet
